channel.title: ELSearch on 博客
channel.description: Recent content in ELSearch on 博客

item.title: ELSearch - 基础的安装与使用
item.description: 软件下载 # curl curl -L -O https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-6.3.2.tar.gz # wget wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-6.3.2.tar.gz.sha512 # yum yum install perl-Digest-SHA # 解决shasum在centos执行不了的问题。 shasum -a 512 -c elasticsearch-6.3.2.tar.gz.sha512 tar -xvf elasticsearch-6.3.2.tar.gz cd elasticsearch-6.3.2/bin 启动服务 # 启动（默认监听9200端口） ./elasticsearch # 后台运行 ./elasticsearch -d # 后台运行并记录pid到文件 ./elasticsearch -d -p ./elasticsearch.pid # 关闭 kill `cat elasticsearch.pid `
